v-model.description: Bind the input box to search for a value in both directions
v-model.description_zh: 双向绑定输入框搜索值

border-color.description: Border color, if the color is configured, there will be a border
border-color.description_zh: 边框颜色，配置了颜色，才会有边框

clearabled.description: Whether to enable the purge control

focus.description: Whether or not to get focus automatically

show-action.description: Whether to display the right control (the "Search" button on the right)
show-action.description_zh: 是否显示右侧控件(右侧的"搜索"按钮)

action-style.description: The style of the control on the right, in the form of an object
action-style.description_zh: 右侧控件的样式，对象形式

input-align.description: Horizontal alignment of input box content
input-align.description_zh: 输入框内容水平对齐方式

disabled.description: Whether to enable the input box

animation.description: Whether to enable animation, see the instructions above
animation.description_zh: 是否开启动画，见上方说明

height.description: Enter the height of the box, in rpx

search-icon-color.description: The color of the search icon is the same as the font color of the input box by default
search-icon-color.description_zh: 搜索图标的颜色，默认同输入框字体颜色

color.description: Enter the font color of the input box

margin.description: The distance between the component and other elements on the top, bottom, left, and right, in the form of a string with units, such as "30rpx", "30rpx 20rpx", etc
margin.description_zh: 组件与其他上下左右元素之间的距离，带单位的字符串形式，如"30rpx"、"30rpx 20rpx"等写法

maxlength.description: The maximum length that can be entered in the input field, -1 is the unlimited length
maxlength.description_zh: 输入框最大能输入的长度，-1为不限制长度

input-style.description: Customize the input box style, object form
input-style.description_zh: 自定义输入框样式，对象形式

search-icon.description: The icon on the left side of the input box can be the uView icon name or the image path
search-icon.description_zh: 输入框左边的图标，可以为uView图标名称或图片路径
